  • Constructor Details

    • CIT2

      public CIT2​(java.lang.String name, CIT2_Generator generator_set, generic.Tuple displacement_interval)
      Constructor for the CIT2 fuzzy set. Equivalent to CIT2(name, generator_set, new Tuple(shifting_step*-1, shifting_step))
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the set
      generator_set - The T1 generator set used to generate the CIT2 set
      displacement_interval - The displacement interval [a, b] (a<=0, b>=0) to use to generate the set

    • CIT2

      public CIT2​(java.lang.String name, CIT2_Generator generator_set, double shifting_step)
      Constructor for the CIT2 fuzzy set. Equivalent to CIT2(name, generator_set, new Tuple(shifting_step*-1, shifting_step))
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the set
      generator_set - The T1 generator set used to generate the CIT2 set
      shifting_step - The value to use to generate the displacement interval [shifting_step*-1, shifting_step]

      public static void plotCIT2​(java.lang.String name, CIT2[] sets, generic.Tuple xAxisRange, int discretizationLevel)
      Plots the FOU of a collection of CIT2 sets
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the plot
      sets - CIT2 sets to plot
      xAxisRange - Range of x values to plot (e.g. [0, 10])
      discretizationLevel - Discretization level to use to plot the sets

      Plots the CIT2 set
      Parameters:
      xAxisRange - Range of x values to plot (e.g. [0, 10])
      discretizationLevel - Discretization level to use to plot the sets

    • getCentroid

      public generic.Tuple getCentroid​(int discretization)
      Computes the centroid of the set
      Specified by:
      getCentroid in interface intervalType2.sets.IntervalT2MF_Interface
      Overrides:
      getCentroid in class intervalType2.sets.IntervalT2MF_Prototype
      Parameters:
      discretization - Number of discretization steps to use
      Returns:
      The Tuple containing the constrained centroid

    • toIT2

      public intervalType2.sets.IntervalT2MF_Interface toIT2()
      Converts the current set into an equivalent (i.e. with the same FOU) IT2 set
      Returns:
      The equivalent IT2 set (i.e. with the same FOU)

    • getRandomAES

      public CIT2_Generator getRandomAES()
      Samples a random AES by shifting the generator set by a random value within the displacement interval (i.e. assumes the displacement interval is continuous)
      Returns:
      A random AES
